review_text:
This home is clearly remodeled, and they did a great job updating it. The decor is simple and clean, very cute. The Kitchen has everything you would need and new appliances. The coffee station was even equipped with coffee, creamer, sugar, breakfast bars and oatmeal, so you don’t have to stop at the store in your way into town. They were thoughtful to add extra mirrors in bedrooms, making it easier for multiple people to get ready with only two bathrooms. It was perfect for our family of 5 adults.
The neighborhood has mature landscaping and typical Great Bend homes around. The only downside was barking/howling dogs one night, but the owner obviously can’t help that. The other thing to know (if you have mobility issues) is that there are stairs immediately inside the door, but only a few steps up to the main floor.
Easy checkin and responsive host if you have any questions before or during the stay. Thanks for an easy place to stay while visiting family in town!
